title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Added new documentation for reusable workflows in GitHub Actions, including concept overview and reference details.
Renamed and restructured the "reusing-workflows" how-to guide to "reuse-workflows" with content reorganization.
Updated Copilot usage report documentation to specify 45-day data retention.
Updated OpenAPI schema descriptions across multiple files.

original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
